db:abstract.db:para: Shows how to use Qt SQL classes with a model/view framework.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app INCLUDEPATH += .
HEADERS = bookdelegate.h bookwindow.h initdb.h RESOURCES = books.qrc SOURCES = bookdelegate.cpp main.cpp bookwindow.cpp FORMS = bookwindow.ui
QT += sql widgets widgets
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/sql/books INSTALLS += target
wince*: { CONFIG(debug, debug|release):sqlPlugins.files = $$QT_BUILD_TREE/plugins/sqldrivers/*d4.dll CONFIG(release, debug|release):sqlPlugins.files = $$QT_BUILD_TREE/plugins/sqldrivers/*[^d]4.dll sqlPlugins.path = sqldrivers DEPLOYMENT += sqlPlugins }
